original: Araṇaṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ▁araṇ aṃ ▁vipāk aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁n asaraṇ o ▁na vipāk o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁hetuyā ▁ekaṃ ▁pe ▁avigate ▁ekaṃ
